Packages 
Package Description
pds
The thread controller, consisting of the main program loop which launches image processing tasks.
pds.cvSvc
Attempts to detect objects such as the table, ping pong ball, and ping pong rackets.
pds.input
Receives program-terminating input and triggers a graceful exit.
pds.output
The output module simply reads the current status of the ping pong table and outputs it to the console.
pds.sitAnalyze
Analyzes the situation from object data provided by cvStores and decides what the ping pong table's current status is.
pds.videoSvc
Hooks into the provided video decoding library and provides video frame data to the rest of the program.
